survey Gouffre36 -title "Gouffre 36" -attr cad_num 211013 -attr exped "UP2010" -entrance 0 -attr profondeur_approx "45" -attr "Developpement_Estime" "50"

    input Gouffre36-e.th2

    centreline
    date 2010.01
    explo-date 2010.01

    units length meters
    units compass clino degrees
    data normal from to tape compass clino
    0 FOND 45 - DOWN

    data dimensions station left right up down
    0 10 3 0 45
    endcentreline

endsurvey
